member.name: T:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter
member.summary: A base class for connection string adaption between the different providers.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Builder
member.summary: Gets or sets the database connection string builder.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.DefaultPort
member.summary: Gets the default port if the database supports it.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.IsFileDriven
member.summary: Gets a flag that determines if this database is file driven.
member.value: true if this instance is file driven; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: A file driven database is something like sqlite or sqlce where the connection depends on the file uri/path being specified in order to connect.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.AllowsUserInstance
member.summary: Gets a flag that termines if the database allows user instances.
member.value: true if [allows user instance]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the host url of the database server.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Database
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific name of the database.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port number.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the user name used to log into the database.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password used to log into the database.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider type of the connection string.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection timeout should the connection take to long to talk to the host.

member.name: P:Amplify.Data.ConnectionStringAdapter.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific properties of the connection string that is unique to the specific type of database.
member.param: The name of the property in the connection string.
